meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emily Gilmore Ashok Poozhikunnel Julie Reynolds Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6514.

td.p: Emily Gilmore, a Latin teacher from Fredericksburg, Virginia
Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois
Julie Reynolds, a medical transcriptionist from Waterville, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,005)

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (Alex: We'll give you the museum. You give us the state.)
(Alex: We'll give you ten characters, and you have to give us five authors, one per clue.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
EmilyWhat is the 20th Amendment
$9,400
JulieWhat is the 22nd?
$9,201
AshokWhat is the 19th Amendment?
$10,000
the 19th Amendment')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Of the 27 amendments to the Constitution, it\'s the number of the only one to contain the word "sex"')

tr.td: Of the 27 amendments to the Constitution, it's the number of the only one to contain the word "sex"
